WordToCheckSchemeControls.instructions-input-hint-text: Give instructions, so you know how to answer.
WordToCheckSchemeControls.word-to-check-input-hint-text: Which column contains the value you want to check?
WordToCheckSchemeControls.information-input-hint-text: Which column contains the additional information about the word checked?

SchemeDeletionControls.schemes-hint-text: Choose what scheme you want to delete
SchemeDeletionControls.no-schemes-configured: You do not have any schemes configured. Please go to schemes creation panel and create a scheme to proceed.

SchemeCreationControls.sheet-choice-hint-text: What sheet are you creating the scheme for?
SchemeCreationControls.scheme-name-hint-text: How would you like to name your scheme?
SchemeCreationControls.translation-column-input-hint-text: Which column contains the translation of the word?
SchemeCreationControls.word-status-column-input-hint-text: Which column contains the status of the word?
SchemeCreationControls.narration-language-input-hint-text: The language of the words you are learning?
SchemeCreationControls.last-test-block: A scheme must have at least one test block.

SchemeManagingControls.no-vocabulary-file: You have no vocabulary file configured. Please go to `File`.

SchemeExistsError.error-message: Scheme with the name `{scheme_name}` already exists. Give your scheme a different name.

error-message: Indexes of translation and status columns must be unique.
Indexes of word and information columns must not be the same.

SheetNotFoundError.error-message: The sheet name configured for that scheme is `{sheet_name}`, but that sheet is not present in the file `{file_path}`.

VocabularyFileNotFoundError.error-message: File with vocabulary at the path: `{file_path}` was not found.

InvalidSchemeError.error-message:
The selected scheme does not fit the sheet. Sheet name: `{sheet_name}`. 
Please check that the sheet has all the columns specified in the scheme.

InvalidRangeOfWordsError.error-message:
The range you specified is invalid.
Your range must be a subrange of range [{start}, {end}] to be valid.

NoWordsMatchingSettings.error-message:
There were no words matching the specified settings. 
(No words with status {status} in range [{range_start}, {range_stop}])

ExcelAppOpenedError.error-message:
We can't save your results when your Excel app is opened. 
Please close it and press `Stop Dictation`.

NarrationError.error-message:
Couldn't narrate. Narrating turned off. 
Establish Internet connection and relaunch the dictation to turn on it back on.

DictationRunControls.dictation-completed-message: Congratulations! You have completed the dictation. The statuses of the words in your sheet have been updated.
DictationRunControls.dictation-stopped-message: Dictation was stopped. The statuses of the words in your sheet have been updated.
DictationRunControls.answer-shown-instructions: The word(s) was(were): {}. Now type it(them) to remember.
DictationRunControls.no-information-message: There was no information about that word.
DictationRunControls.previous-word-label-first-message: Here will be your previous answer.
DictationRunControls.additional-information-label-first-messa: Here will be the information about the previous answer.
DictationRunControls.answer-shown-prompt: Answer Shown. You will be asked to type it again afterwards.

DictationRunSettingsControls.target-choice-hint-text: Words with what status you want to practice?

DictationSettingsControls.statuses-updated-message:

AppLanguageControls.restart-information: You will have to restart the app for the change to be applied.
